Teaching

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
teaching:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of teaching:, general subclasses such as action, related classes and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about teaching:
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Teaching by oral presentation about a particular subject.

rdfs:label
lecture (en)
and
Vorlesung (de)

rdfs:comment

rdfs:isDefinedBy
teaching:

teaching:Teacher

a
rdfs:Class

rdfs:isDefinedBy

a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a person who teaches.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
teaching:
rdfs:subClassOf
human:PersonRole
teaching:Teaching
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Person's action of communicating information in order to help another person to acquire knowledge, competence or value.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
teaching:
rdfs:subClassOf
human:Procedure

owl:ObjectProperty
